'''Beta 1.19.20.24''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.19.20.24''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the fourth and the final beta/''Preview'' for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.20]], released on July 27, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/7975258412045|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.20.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 27, 2022}}</ref> which fixed some bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''Blocks'''
* Campfires can once again be stacked correctly ({{bug|MCPE-159398}})

'''Graphical'''
* Reverted the fix for {{bug|MCPE-105487}}, which can cause the textures to turn pink after playing for long periods of time on a server.
* Fixed an issue with RTX on Windows where point lights were unintentionally accumulated for emissive blocks ({{bug|MCPE-159485}}, {{bug|MCPE-159488}})

'''Items'''
* Fixed a bug where pistons sometimes did not drop the piston item when broken by the arm ({{bug|MCPE-158314}})
* Fixed a bug where bows could fail to shoot an arrow the first time they were used, this also affected crossbows and throwing tridents ({{bug|MCPE-159467}})

'''Performance and Stability'''
* The game no longer crashes when browsing the Marketplace
* Fixed a crash related to spawn eggs ({{bug|MCPE-159302}})</onlyinclude>
